de.iabg.mesh
Class JMeshConnectionFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      de.iabg.mesh.JMeshConnectionFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class JMeshConnectionFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame

A JFrame for a rigidly-connected JMeshConnectionPanel. This component adds a HistoryPanel, a StatusPanel, and a DrawingPanel to itself and wires them together with the JMeshConnectionPanel. In this way, all of the properties of the JMeshConnectionPanel are displayed.

Version:
November 1, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
See Also:
Serialized Form
